channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from multiple RSS sources, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rookie Investor? Never Make This $40,000 Mistake
item.description: This episode could make you $40,000. Seriously, one property management mistake cost our own expert investor, Dave Meyer, anywhere from $30,000 to $40,000, BUT it’s easier to avoid than you […]

item.title: Chicago-based Hyde Park Venture Partners closes $98M Fund IV with two investments made so far
item.description: Hyde Park Venture Partners is known for having visibility into more than 90% of mid-continent startups and being early backers of companies like ShipBob, FourKites, G2, LogicGate and Dentologie. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: How Campus Protests Could Shape the 2024 Elections — And Not Just the Presidency
item.description: With hundreds of arrests and more campus standoffs looming, local law enforcement officials could face consequences at the ballot box.

item.title: NIH’s Eliseo Pérez-Stable, MD, Talks Health Disparities, Biology, Behavior, and Culture
item.description: Eliseo Pérez-Stable, MD, director of the National Institute on Minority Health and Health Disparities, talks about health disparities and how his studies aim to improve interventions in clinical settings and across communities.

item.title: How to Supplement Your Income with Real Estate (So You Can Do What You Love)
item.description: Why are rock stars turning to real estate side hustles to pay their bills? During the lockdowns, many musicians, gig workers, and creatives saw their income streams dwindle. There were no […]

item.title: Midi is building a digital platform for an oft-overlooked area of women’s health
item.description: When Joanna Strober was around 47, she stopped sleeping. While losing sleep is a common symptom of perimenopause, she first had to go to multiple providers, including driving 45 minutes out of San Francisco to pay $750 out of pocket, to get that diagnosis and proper treatment. “That feeling of wow, I’ve really been suffering […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: They Killed Their Abusive Partners. Now Their Sentences Could Be Reconsidered.
item.description: Oklahoma could re-examine how it punishes people whose crimes came after years of domestic abuse. Other states may follow.

item.title: New ‘FLiRT’ Variants Spark Summer COVID Surge Warning
item.description: A data scientist who has accurately predicted COVID waves since the beginning of the pandemic warns that a surge is on the horizon.

item.title: Seeing Greene: Stolen Properties and Why Your Rate Doesn’t (Really) Matter
item.description: There’s a silent threat out there that most real estate investors have no idea about. It’s a threat that could take away all your cash flow, ruin your real estate […]

item.title: Razer hit with $1.1M FTC fine over glowing ‘N95’ mask COVID claims
item.description: The Federal Trade Commission hit Razer with a $1.1 million fine Tuesday. The order claims that the gaming accessory maker misled consumers by claiming that its flashy Zephyr mask was certified as N95-grade. “These businesses falsely claimed, in the midst of a global pandemic, that their face mask was the equivalent of an N95 certified […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: What Being Trans in Prison Is Really Like
item.description: Amid a wave of anti-trans legislation, and the violence that often follows, four people share their experiences in the criminal justice system.

item.title: You Give Me (Spring) Fever
item.description: New Season Brings Boost of Energy, but Also Unplanned Pregnancies

item.title: Lessons From the Rich That Took Me from $0 to a $1,000,000+ Business
item.description: Want to be a millionaire or build a business that brings in seven figures? Want generational wealth and to be debt-free? Want to know that you have enough money to […]

item.title: With $175M in new funding, Island is putting the browser at the center of enterprise security
item.description: When a company raises $175M at a $3B valuation, it gets your attention. When that startup is a browser company, all the more. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: The Enduring Use of Solitary, and New Proposed Limits That Will Likely Fail (Again)
item.description: Isolation’s damaging effects are widely known. But many facilities confine people — even youth — virtually all day, sometimes in shower stalls.

item.title: Older Adults: 9 Nutrients You May Be Missing
item.description: With age, your body doesn’t absorb nutrients well, so every calorie you consume must be packed with nutrition. Here are 9 nutrients older adults often need more of.

item.title: Tenant Not Paying Rent? Here’s What to Do
item.description: A tenant not paying rent can turn your profit upside down. Should you find yourself in this situation, there are several key steps you must take.

item.title: Screenshots suggest TikTok is circumventing Apple App Store commissions
item.description: The feature may be hidden from most users, either by design or because it's only shown to users in a specific group, like testers or high spenders. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: Officials Failed to Act When COVID Hit Prisons. A New Study Shows the Deadly Cost.
item.description: People in prison died at 3.4 times the rate of the free population, with the oldest hit hardest. New data holds lessons for preventing future deaths.

item.title: The Immunity Challenge: How aging affects your immune system
item.description: How does getting older affect your immune system? How can you keep those effects to a minimum? Your answers are here.
